title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, May 9, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of poet Ellen Bryant Voigt (1943), who said, “Resist any temptation to use the poem to make its readers like you, or admire you, or forgive you."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
